item.title: Writing on the Dunnhumby Engineering Blog
item.description: Dunnhumby is a retail data science company that I’ve been working with lately. I’ve enjoyed writing a couple of articles for their Data Science and Engineering blog. The first is a slightly extended version of an article on here, Scala Types in Scio Pipelines. The more recent article is original and talks about the experiences we’ve had putting together streaming demos of real-time streaming data processing solutions. If you’re interested, you can find that article at Building Live Streaming Demos
